ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Playstation
ygData.msgSnippet: If you think AO is any different in terms beter customer service, tight dev cycles, GM events, etc. you are dead wrong.  DonÂ¹t get me wrong, AO is a great
ygData.messageBody:
Re: [EverQuest] Playstation If you think AO is any different in terms beter customer service, tight dev cycles, GM events, etc. you are dead wrong.  Don’t get me wrong, AO is a great game. But it is as bad (or worse) than EQ is terms of customer service.

On 5/7/02 9:30 AM, "nara MKs" <masterkiis_nara@...> wrote:

Or how about the "rumor" i heard that the first people
to have access to the alledged EQ2 will be ONLY those
who are on Legends?  We peons will have to wait who
knows how long...am getting burned out on all the
politics and greed...AO is looking REALLY good about
now

Amaiya, 21st season Druid
Fennin Ro

--- Romanlegion88@... wrote:
> Well now we know where all the new development ideas
> have gone.... This kinda thing pisses me off. Like
> the legends server should be what everyone already
> pays for, and all the ideas and new development for
> this PS2 game is the kind of thing they should be
> doing to the current EQ and its paying subscribers.
> When is the last time you been to a GM event, or
> have seen a majot development to the story with new
> zones or changes in zones?
>
>         -rob
>
>
